content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest, Ryanah. The apartment is a lovely 25 square meters and I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 700 Euros per month. I am a student, so I am very dependable and responsible. I hope we can come to an agreement that is fair for both of us.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for that information, Ryanah. Based on the size of the apartment and the market rates in Munich, I am willing to consider a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This would be reasonable for both of us, and I believe it would be a fair compromise. What are your thoughts on this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for considering my budget.
```
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Ryanah. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. I'll send you an email to confirm the rental agreement and provide you with the necessary paperwork. In the meantime, if you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
